availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Speed Smith Goodloe (Lexington, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Son of David S. Goodloe and Sally A. Goodloe. Married to Mary E. Shreve Goodloe on April 5, 1860. Resident of Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850 and 1860. Graduated from Centre College in 1856. Attorney in Lexington. Judge of the Lexington City Court from 1862 to 1870.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 214. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, Ward 3, p. 146. U.S., School Catalogs, 1765-1935, Ancestry, Centre College, 1860, p. 26. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Jefferson County, 1860; William Henry Perrin, ed., History of Fayette County, Kentucky, with an Outline Sketch of the Blue Grass Region by Robert Peter, M. D., Professor of Chemistry in the Agricultural and Mechanical College, Chemist to the State Geological Society, Etc. (Chicago, IL: O. L. Baskin and Company, 1882), p.609. Alexander Maydwell, Jr., comp., Maydwell's Lexington City Directory for 1867 (Cincinnati: Miami Printing and Publishing Co., 1867), p. 13. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 298-306. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 301-306. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1864,” in 1865 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), 9-12. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865,” in 1865/66 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1866), 9-12. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1866,” in 1866 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 347-350. Find A Grave, "Speed S. Goodloe (1837-1877)," Memorial #100859397, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100859397 (accessed September 1, 2017). KYR-0001-020-1934.
